name: Cloud Study Jam - Docker & Kubernetes - Google Developer Group (GDG)
description:
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

We are running an introductory, hands on, workshop.

No prior knowledge of Google Cloud, Docker or Kubernetes required!

It's free to attend, with free access to Qwiklabs, the official Google training hands-on platform (a $55+ value). No need to register with a credit card.

Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs.

You will get hands-on experience with Kubernetes.

Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise.

After our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home.

Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to complete any labs you want.

The session: https://blog.qwiklabs.com/study-jam-k8s1/

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)!

Donâ€™t forget your charger.

Agenda

6:00 pm Welcome!
6:05 pm Get free access to Qwiklabs
6:10 pm Lab 1: Introduction to Docker
6:45 pm Lab 2: Hello Node Kubernetes
7:10 pm Lab 3: Orchestrating the Cloud with Kubernetes
7:30 pm Discussion & Demonstration
8:00 pm Event Ends
how_to_find_us:
We are at the Eagle Lab in Douglas 
Queen Victoria House, Victoria Street, Douglas, Isle of Man, IM1 2LF
(It's the old Manx Telecom building)
